dialogues.Text: Where are you going? Are you done already? Please, come back!
Oh… No… What have I done…?
Calm down, maybe it’s not that bad. Tomorrow will be a whole new day.
Hello?
Long time no talk… I hope you still remember me.
You again!? Leave me alone already!
Calm down, I won’t waste your time. I just called to check on your business.
Why? Are you jealous?
My business is going incredibly well. A lot of clients come to try my food, and they always leave smiling happily.
Really…? I’m not sure about that…
What are you talking about?
Somebody told me your restaurant sucks. People who try eating there never come twice, and your reputation is just getting worse.
Haha! Do you think you’re going to make me feel bad by saying a couple of stupid phrases? Don’t make me laugh…
My restaurant is succeeding. Life’s good, I’m not going to let you ruin my project.
And stop calling me!
How annoying…
Well, I should rest. Tomorrow is going to be a busy day.
What is happening…? Why is no one coming?
Maybe that annoying bastard was right… Maybe this is the end…
Dad… Mom… I’ve let you down…
I failed at trying to give the business another go…
I’m sorry… I’m so sorry…
I guess I’ll have to close the restaurant again.
